message.protectit.block_region.successfu: Region %s -> %s is now owned and protected.

message.protectit.non_givable_item: That is not a valid item to give.
message.protectit.max_claims_met: You have already reached your max. number of claims.
message.protectit.property.rename.succes: The property was successfully renamed to
message.protectit.property.name.unknown: Player does not own a property named

message.protectit.property.permission.ch: The permission was successfully changed for property

message.protectit.property.transfer.prop: The deed's property does not match the property.

message.protectit.property.deed.not_doma: The property is a fief or you are not the owner.

message.protectit.zone.rename_success: The zone was successfully renamed to

tooltip.protectit.claim.howto: Place block to highlight the area you wish to claim. Use placed stake to claim the land.
tooltip.protectit.remove_claim.howto:
Place block to highlight your property.
Use placed stake to remove your claimed property and get a claim stake back.
tooltip.protectit.property_lever.howto:
Place lever within your property.
Use placed lever to highlight your land.
tooltip.protectit.fiefdom_deed.howto: Use license when within the property region to enable subdivisibility.~The property can now be sub-divided using the command /protect block subdivide...
tooltip.protectit.fiefdom_deed.title: Subdivision Licensed To
tooltip.protectit.unclaimed_stake.howto: Place block within the highlighted region. Use placed stake to claim the land.
tooltip.protectit.deed.howto: Use deed when within the property region to transfer ownership.
tooltip.protectit.deed.title: Deed To Seller's Property
tooltip.protectit.lease.howto: Use Fief Deed when within the property region to transfer ownership.
tooltip.protectit.lease.title: Fief Deed To Lord's Property
